title: Lake Chelan National Recreation Area: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Looking for more information about North Cascades NP? Explore the other pages in this section to learn more.  Â    News Browse press releases, view the park newspaper, and dig into archived news. Photos and More Experience the park from afar! Check out our webcams, photo galleries, videos, and more. History and Culture Discover the recent and ancient history of the North Cascades area.  Nature Explore the diversity of the park, from the temperate rainforest of the west side to the dry ponderosa pine ecosystem of the east.  Education Gather information on classroom activities and field trip opportunities for teachers and more.  Kids and Youth Become a Junior Ranger with four age-appropriate booklets, watch a one-hour Electronic Field Trip and more.  Publications  Find trip planning brochures, campground information, park maps, visitor information guide, and Junior Ranger booklets.
